name: The Puurse V2
description: Let your accessory do the talking with this furry cryptokitty inspired tote! Bold n bright, this little accessory is just the thing to really make your outfit POP! The Puurse V2 features modern dark cream straps to the top and ample space for your makeup essentials! Extra hint: Want to make the Puurse really stand out? Pair with a Little Black Dress for a night out on the town!
